instruction: Please provide a list of the constituents of the MSCI ACWI Index that have physical assets in biodiversity-sensitive areas.
output: Through geospatial analysis and using the MSCI Asset Location Database, we have identified the following constituents of the MSCI ACWI Index that have physical assets in biodiversity-sensitive areas based on the global, area-weighted mean for the Mean Species Abundance (MSA) metric for 2015: (insert list of constituents here). Please note that these biodiversity-sensitive areas are intact ecosystems with minimal species loss and are recognized as important areas for conservation efforts.
